exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : Z H : exists p q m : Z, (a = m * (q * q - p * p) /\\ b = 2 * m * (p * q) \\/ a = 2 * m * (p * q) /\\ b = m * (q * q - p * p)) /\\ c = m * (p * p + q * q) /\\ m >= 0 /\\ cond_pq p q Unable to unify "exists p q m : Z, (?M1885 = m * (q * q - p * p) /\\ ?M1886 = 2 * m * (p * q) \\/ ?M1885 = 2 * m * (p * q) /\\ ?M1886 = m * (q * q - p * p)) /\\ ?M1887 = m * (p * p + q * q) /\\ m >= 0 /\\ cond_pq p q" with "pos_triple a b c /\\ a * a + b * b = c * c".

original: intros a b c H. unfold is_pytha in *. unfold pytha_set in *. apply pytha_thm1. auto.
